long_description: These WrightSock CoolMesh II crew socks feature a 2-layer design to minimize blisters and maximize moisture management, keeping feet comfortable in multisport pursuits. Inner layer is made of smooth, undyed, hydrophobic Dri-WRIGHT(TM) polyester, nylon and Lycra(R) spandex to maximize moisture wicking for cool, dry feet. Outer layer of Dri-WRIGHT polyester, nylon and Lycra spandex and mesh weave enhances moisture control and airflow. Interaction between inner and outer layers absorbs friction and shearing forces to prevent blisters. Mesh panel across the top of the foot allows maximum wicking action; arch braces support feet. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: These WrightSock CoolMesh II crew socks feature a 2-layer design to minimize blisters and maximize moisture management, keeping feet comfortable in multisport pursuits.
